oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup - 1947-06-03 - KOMA
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on June 3, 1947 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Lem Turner (master of ceremonies), Allan Page (announcer, director), and Kenyon Brown (producer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chuck Davis; Roundup Boys; Ann Bond; Lem Hawkins; Lexie Lou; Jack Beasley
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) [Blank] / (0:22) Opening statements and theme / (1:44) Allan Page introduces Lem Turner and Lem tells a joke / (2:15) Chuck Davis and the Roundup Boys perform "My Galveston Gal" / (3:21) Lem Turner and Ann Bond tell a joke / (4:03) Ann Bond performs "The Wigwam Song" / (6:18) Lem Hawkins and Lem Turner tell a joke / (7:18) Lem Hawkins performs "The Man On The Flying Trapeze" / (9:35) Lem Turner introduces Lexie Lou / (9:45) Lexie Lou performs "Bluebonnet Trail" [unconfirmed] / (11:50) Lem Turner and Jack Beasley tell a joke / (12:04) Jack Beasley performs "I Talk To Myself About You" / (14:07) Lem Turner introduces Chuck Davis which leads into Chuck performing the closing theme / (14:33) Closing statements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); CBS Inc.; Davis, Chuck; Bond, Ann; Beasley, Jack
